CustomField.description: Req::802 This flag / field shall identify the Legal Entity
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Based on the ERP system used to execute/deliver the orders. For example - If Order execution/Customer invoicing is done using fNOK SAP P20 system then select fNOK otherwise, if using fALU SAP BPP system then select fALU.
CustomField.label: Contract Signing Entity
